com.nokia.payment

Class NPayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.payment.NPayManager

  • public class NPayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Payment flow control class.

    NPayManager class allows applications to access the Nokia In-App Payment functionality on the device. NPayManager class provides services like:

    • check the availability of the Nokia In-App Payment feature on the device
    • initiate Nokia In-App Payment feature installation process
    • fetching product pricing information based on product id
    • initiate the product purchase process
    • check for restorable items

    All the services provided by this class use separate callback interface. There is a setNPayListener() method to provide instance of the class implementing the NPayListener interface. All methods, except isNPayAvailable(), in this class are asynchronous and provide response via various callbacks provided by NPayListener interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NPayManager

        public NPayManager(MIDlet midlet)
            throws NPayException
        Prepares the NPayManager class.

        The argument MIDlet is used for lifecycle management during purchase process and therefore must be reference to the main application MIDlet that uses this library. For example when Nokia In-App Payment jar accesses the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler, currently executing application will be destroyed using notifyDestroyed() from the MIDlet passed in as parameter to allow the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler to come to foreground.

        Parameters:
        midlet - reference to main application MIDlet
        Throws:
        NPayException - when MIDlet passed as parameter is null

    • Method Detail

      • getProductData

        public void getProductData(java.lang.String[] productIdList)
                    throws NPayException,
                           java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Retrieve product data.

        This method returns immediately. When product data is fetched by the library, the productDataReceived() method is called via NPayListener interface.

        Parameters:
        productIdList - array of product id's
        Throws:
        NPayException - when NPayListener is not set
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when Nokia In-App Payment library is not properly initialised

      • isNPayAvailable

        public boolean isNPayAvailable()
                        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Checks if Nokia In-App Payment feature is available in the device.

        This method allows application to check if the purchase feature is available in the device and react accordingly in the UI; e.g. by showing a confirmation notification that offers options to start the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler installation and environment configuration, or exit the application.

        Returns:
        true if Nokia In-App Payment Enabler is installed on the device, false if is not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when Nokia In-App Payment library is not properly initialised

      • purchaseProduct

        public void purchaseProduct(java.lang.String contentId,
                   java.lang.String productId)
                     throws NPayException,
                            java.lang.SecurityException,
                            java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Deprecated. Please use purchaseProduct(String productId) instead
        Throws:
        NPayException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • purchaseProduct

        public void purchaseProduct(java.lang.String productId)
                     throws NPayException,
                            java.lang.SecurityException,
                            java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Starts the purchase process.

        To purchase a product, you need to provide valid product id to the library, otherwise NPayException is thrown. This call returns immediately. When the purchase process is finished, the purchaseCompleted() method is called via NPayListener interface.

        Parameters:
        productId - product id
        Throws:
        NPayException - when there is an error in parameters and the request cannot be processed by the library
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when Nokia In-App Payment Enabler installation procedure has been started or Nokia In-App Payment library is not properly initialised
        java.lang.SecurityException

      • setNPayListener

        public void setNPayListener(NPayListener listener)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                            NPayException
        Sets the listener for Nokia In-App Payment Enabler responses.

        The provided listener interface will relay all the callbacks from the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler to the implementing class.

        Parameters:
        listener - reference to the class that implements the NPayListener interface
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when Nokia In-App Payment library is not properly initialised
        NPayException - when parameter is null

      • launchNPaySetup

        public void launchNPaySetup()
                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                            ConnectionNotFoundException
        Launch Nokia In-App Payment Enabler installation and environment configuration routine.

        This method allows application to initiate the installation and environment configuration routine of the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler. This way application has a possibility to trigger the installation and configuration process separately by user-clickable button or any other appropriate moment.

        Note! When this method is called, caller midlet will be closed and then relaunched when the setup and configuration of the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler is finished.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when Nokia In-App Payment library is not properly initialised
        ConnectionNotFoundException - when platform is unable to fetch the Nokia In-App Payment Enabler installer from the network.
